dmca.title: Claim of Copyright Infringment
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Kenton McLeod [mailto:kentonmc@guardianmedia.net.au] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 17, 2006 8:59 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Claim of Copyright Infringment

To George Poletes, Corporate Counsel, ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc

The copyrighted work at issue is the "Dinner Moments" text that appears on
http://www.guardianmedia.net.au/OurPackages.htm

Infringing webpages:
http://www.spikegroup.com/acatalog/wedding_videos_producer_additional_servic
es.htm
http://www.spikegroup.com/acatalog/wedding_videographer_additional_services.
htm
http://www.spikegroup.com/acatalog/wedding_dvd_companies_additional_services
.htm
http://www.spikegroup.com/acatalog/wedding_night_dvd_additional_services.htm
http://www.spikegroup.com/acatalog/sydney_wedding_dvds_additional_services.h
tm
http://www.spikegroup.com/acatalog/wedding_videos_additional_services.htm
http://www.spikegroup.com/acatalog/wedding_day_videos_additional_services.ht
m
http://www.spikegroup.com/acatalog/sydney_wedding_dvd_producers_additional_s
ervices.htm


My name is Kenton McLeod,
My email is kentonmc@guardianmedia.net.au My address is: PO Box 45,
                ETTALONG BEACH,
                NSW AUSTRALIA 2257

The contact information for the offending websites is as follows:
spikemedia.net        help@spikemedia.net
digitalstudios.com.au        info@digitalstudios.com.au

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described
above on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title
17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and
that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner
of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.


Signed: _____________________________

             Kenton McLeod
